Parameters: The required number of samples, must be at least 1.
The targe number of samples, must be at least minimum
The quality of samples, range 0-1. Used to decide between different formats which have the same number of samples but different rendering quality.
setSamples(int, int, float).FullName: public void setSamples (int minimum, int preferred, float Q)

ClassDesc: in API 16 Class which is used to describe a pixel format for a graphical buffer. This is used to describe the intended format of the display surface. The configuration is described by pairs of minimum and preferred bit depths for each component within the config and additional structural information.
